app.title: Wim Hof Breathing App
app.description: A simple web app to guide you through the Wim Hof breathing exercises.

cookieBanner.title: This website uses cookies and local storage
cookieBanner.description: We use tracking (Google Analytics) and local storage to improve your experience. By continuing to use this site, you accept this usage.

footer.copyright: Wim Hof Breathing App. Not affiliated with Wim Hof Method.

home.title: Wim Hof Method Breathing App
home.welcome: Welcome! Explore guided breathing exercises, track your progress, and learn about the Wim Hof Method.

breathingExercise.title: Wim Hof Method
breathingExercise.subtitle: Configure and start your breathing exercise

safetyNotice.title: ⚠️ Important Safety Notice
safetyNotice.description: By proceeding with this exercise, you acknowledge that you have read and accepted our health & safety disclaimer. You use these techniques at your own risk.
safetyNotice.warning: Never practice while driving, swimming, or in any situation where loss of consciousness could cause harm.

setupForm.subtitle: Configure your Wim Hof Method breathing session
setupForm.indefiniteHoldHelp: Hold until you choose to continue
setupForm.estimatedTimeDescription: Complete session duration including all rounds and rest periods
setupForm.presetSavedDescription: Your breathing exercise configuration has been saved and will be loaded automatically next time.
setupForm.saveFailedDescription: Failed to save preset. Please try again.

preparation.title: Get Ready
preparation.subtitle: Prepare for your breathing session
preparation.instruction2: Relax and focus on your breathing

hold.title: Hold Your Breath
hold.instruction2Timed: Don't force it - breathe when you need to

recovery.title: Recovery Breath
recovery.subtitle: Take a deep breath and hold

healthSafety.title: Health & Safety Disclaimer
healthSafety.warning: WARNING: By using this website and engaging in breathing exercises, you acknowledge and accept full responsibility for any and all consequences, injuries, or harm that may result from your use of these techniques.
healthSafety.useAtRisk: Use at Your Own Risk: The breathing exercises and methods presented on this website can be physically demanding and may pose risks to your health. You should only use these techniques after carefully assessing your own physical and mental fitness, and only if you are confident in your ability to do so safely.
healthSafety.medicalConsultation: Medical Consultation Required: Before beginning any breathing exercises or physical practices, consult with a qualified healthcare professional, especially if you have any pre-existing medical conditions including but not limited to:

conditions.other: Any other medical conditions or concerns

healthSafety.safetyPrecautions: Safety Precautions: Never practice these breathing exercises while driving, swimming, in water, or in any situation where loss of consciousness could lead to injury or death. Always practice in a safe environment, preferably seated or lying down.
healthSafety.limitationLiability: Limitation of Liability: The creators, maintainers, and contributors of this website expressly disclaim all liability for any injury, harm, or adverse effects resulting from the use of this website or the techniques described herein. By using this website, you agree to hold harmless all parties involved in its creation and maintenance from any claims, damages, or losses arising from your use.
healthSafety.noProfessionalAdvice: No Professional Advice: This website does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The content is for informational purposes only and should not be considered a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Disclaimer
intellectualProperty.noAffiliation: No Affiliation: This website and application are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or officially connected to Wim Hof or the Wim Hof Method organization. The Wim Hof Method is the intellectual property of Wim Hof and his team. This project is an independent, non-commercial tool created for educational and personal use only.
intellectualProperty.credit: All credit for the Wim Hof Method, its techniques, and its name belongs to Wim Hof. For official information, training, and resources, please visit the official Wim Hof Method website.
intellectualProperty.rightsHolder: If you are the rights holder and wish to request changes or removal, please contact the site owner.
